componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: After completing your Clause Analysis, change the Approval Status to Ready for G4.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Once G4 is approved in WtD, the Approval Status will automatically change to G4 Approved.ï»¿

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: When you conclude your negotiations with the Customer, change the Approval Status to Ready for G5.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Once G5 is approved in WtD, the Approval Status will automatically change to G5 Approved and the Agreement's Status will be set to Ready for Signatures.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Please make sure that all the below-listed fields have data before activating the agreement:

Agreement Number - Customer Provided, Agreement Name, Account Legal Entity, End Customer, Nokia Legal Entity, Related Opportunity, Lead BG, Sales mode, Product Categories, Execution Category, SW business type, Other business types, Agreement Start Date, Term (Years) OR Agreement End Date, Payout Frequency, Payment term, Incoterm
